overview: In Paddy O'Brian's Fucking My Arse, Paddy - one of the world's hottest gay porn sensations - stars in a movie devoted entirely to him. Five of Britain's top porn idols get fucked by the Cockney sex god in five pre-cum-inducing scenes. Paddy's casting for hot guys (from hundreds of applicants) for his next movie and he needs to road test each and every one of them. He loves every second of it - the taste of their lips, their mouths around his cock, their tongues up his arse, and his awesome cock in their eager guts.
title: Paddy O'Brian's Fucking My Arse
